comment.author: 54731294@N07
comment._content:
Patrick,
The Photo is from 22 squadron it was taken at Vert Galand on the 1st of April 1918 the day the Royal Flying Corps became the Royal Air Force. The aircraft is a Bristol Fighter F2B. I also have the names of the pilots and observers if you are interested.

Regards,
John

comment.author: 29998366@N02
comment._content: @John Thank you for this additional information! We would be very interested to have the names of the pilots and observers, as well as any other information you have about the historical background of this photograph.
